dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 最近我开始打篮球了，真的非常有趣！你应该试试！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 真的？我不知道你会打篮球！你觉得它比足球更好玩吧？

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我觉得篮球的节奏很快，更能让我兴奋！但是足球也有它的魅力。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我是个直来直去的人，我觉得踢足球可以放松自己，更带劲。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 不过，打篮球的时候，与朋友一起配合真的很棒！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 对呀，篮球真是个团队运动，有时候能炸出不一样的火花，却又让你攒下许多回忆！

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 我最近开始打网球了，真的很有趣呀！减压又锻炼身体！

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 打网球？我一直觉得这非常难学！你觉得怎么样？

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 一开始很困难，但现在已经能进步不少了！网球就是需要坚持嘛！
dialog_00007_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的运动/dialog_00007_001/003.wav

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 我刚刚完成了一次马拉松，最好成绩是籍足而出！

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 哇，马拉松！这需要超强的毅力，你觉得过程怎么样？

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 超级棒！虽然很累，但能看到终点线时的感觉真是无可替代！

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 确实，这种成就感很重要，感觉到自己的进步非常出色。

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 我真的希望下次还能继续创造更好的成绩！

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 完全可以做到的！我相信你一定会超越自己！

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: 容易上瘾啊，其实早睡也值得一试！
dialog_00002_002.wav_path: 探讨早起和晚睡的习惯/dialog_00002_002/005.wav

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and disgusted emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: 应该不会吧？我可不想错过我阅读的晚高峰！
dialog_00002_002.wav_path: 探讨早起和晚睡的习惯/dialog_00002_002/006.wav

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: 我真的很喜欢早起，早上的阳光和安静的空气让我感觉特别好！
dialog_00005_000.wav_path: 探讨早起和晚睡的习惯/dialog_00005_000/001.wav

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: 哇，听起来真不错！但我一直都是个晚睡的人，早起来完全没精神。
dialog_00005_000.wav_path: 探讨早起和晚睡的习惯/dialog_00005_000/002.wav

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: 可是早起可以让我拥有更多的时间做自己喜欢的事情，比如读书或运动。
dialog_00005_000.wav_path: 探讨早起和晚睡的习惯/dialog_00005_000/003.wav

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and angry emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: 可我就是觉得晚上比较高效，晚上思维还是比较清晰的！
dialog_00005_000.wav_path: 探讨早起和晚睡的习惯/dialog_00005_000/004.wav

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: 我理解你的观点，但是有没有想过早起带来的爽快感？
dialog_00005_000.wav_path: 探讨早起和晚睡的习惯/dialog_00005_000/005.wav

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: 或许有道理，听你这么说我也想尝试一下！
dialog_00005_000.wav_path: 探讨早起和晚睡的习惯/dialog_00005_000/006.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 我一直很喜欢爬山，特别是去探险的感觉，令人兴奋！
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 交流喜欢的户外运动类型/dialog_00003_002/001.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 爬山挺不错啊！不过我其实更偏好跑步，感觉可以放松不少。
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 交流喜欢的户外运动类型/dialog_00003_002/002.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 哦，原来你喜欢跑步，那你有没有跑过马拉松呢？
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 交流喜欢的户外运动类型/dialog_00003_002/003.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 实际上，我报名过一次马拉松，还完成了，真是太有成就感了！
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 交流喜欢的户外运动类型/dialog_00003_002/004.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 听起来真的很棒！你肯定很有耐力！
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 交流喜欢的户外运动类型/dialog_00003_002/005.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 确实很快乐，你有什么推荐的山吗？
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 交流喜欢的户外运动类型/dialog_00003_002/006.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 上周我去爬山了，那种登顶的感觉真是太棒了！
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流喜欢的户外运动类型/dialog_00001_000/001.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 真的吗？我一直想尝试爬山，可是我有点怕高。
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流喜欢的户外运动类型/dialog_00001_000/002.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 没关系的，其实可以从简单的路线开始，慢慢来就好！

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 你这么说我感觉有些放心了，真有机会我可能会试试。

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 而且爬山的时候还能享受大自然的美，心情都好很多！
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流喜欢的户外运动类型/dialog_00001_000/005.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 听起来真好，那一定要找个时间一起去！

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 我真的喜欢秋天，空气清新，而且树叶都会变色，特别漂亮！
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨喜欢的季节/dialog_00008_001/001.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 嗯，我觉得秋天确实很不错，收获的季节，人们总是很开心。
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨喜欢的季节/dialog_00008_001/002.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 对啊，而且秋天有很多好玩的活动，比如去采果子或者去看枫叶！
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨喜欢的季节/dialog_00008_001/003.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 我还没去过看红叶，听说特别美，你今年打算去看看吗？
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨喜欢的季节/dialog_00008_001/004.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 我想去，而且应该不会太晚吧！
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨喜欢的季节/dialog_00008_001/005.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 我最喜欢的季节是秋天，颜色都变得特别好看！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 秋天倒是挺美的，凉凉的气候也舒服！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 对啊，尤其是那些柿子树，真的是幸福的颜色！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 哈哈，你说得太夸张啦，不过我也喜欢喝热茶，听你这么说好像更想喝了。

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 我们可以买几根糖葫芦，一边走一边吃多不错！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 好主意，特别是在阳光下吃糖葫芦一定很不错！

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 我有一个超爱的早餐店，他们的厚煎饼和果酱简直是太好吃了！

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 真的？我特别喜欢吃煎饼！那家店叫什么名字？

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 它叫'早安饼屋'，每次去的时候总是有很多人。

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 听起来不错，我下次也想去试试。

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 呀，他们家的牛肉三明治也特别推荐！

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 听上去太诱人了，那我是真的得去趟！

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 最近我看了一些关于垂直农业的文章，感觉这个方向非常有潜力。
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00003_002/001.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 垂直农业？哦，我听说过，但不太了解，你可以详细讲讲吗？
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00003_002/002.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 当然可以！这也是个很节省空间的解决方案，尤其是在城市或者土地稀缺的地方。
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00003_002/003.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 听起来真的不错，未来我们吃的可能都不需要从乡下运过来，太棒了！
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00003_002/004.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 没错，而且还可以使用水培技术，节省资源！
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00003_002/005.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 哇，这技术以前怎么没听说过？很期待了解更多！
dialog_00003_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00003_002/006.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 听说现在有很多新技术能帮助提高农作物的产量，这真是太令人兴奋了！
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00005_002/001.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 是啊，特别是喷灌系统和无人机都提高了农场的效率，我也觉得这很好。
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00005_002/002.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 我们是否可以利用这些技术来改善环境呢？我对此主持的一个研究项目非常感兴趣！
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00005_002/003.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 听起来很有前途，尤其是在减少用水量和农药使用方面，真希望能多一些这样的讨论。
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00005_002/004.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 除了技术，我们还需关注农民的接受能力。
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00005_002/005.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 嗯，还有传统方法怎么把新技术融合，确实应该鼓励更多的讨论。
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨对未来农业技术的展望/dialog_00005_002/006.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 哇，恐龙真是太酷了，我小时候非常喜欢考古和那些巨大的生物。
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的博物馆/dialog_00009_000/004.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 如果下次你有空我们可以一起去哦！

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 太好了，我一定会来，让我们找一天去吧！

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 我真的很喜欢历史博物馆，里面藏有许多有趣的文物！
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的博物馆/dialog_00006_002/001.wav

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 哇，真的？我没想过有人会这么爱那里的东西，有什么特别吸引你的呢？
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的博物馆/dialog_00006_002/002.wav

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 我喜欢里面的古代武器展览，总是感觉穿越回去了。尤其是那些欧洲的骑士盔甲！
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的博物馆/dialog_00006_002/003.wav

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 嗯，那听起来相当酷。我比较喜欢科学博物馆，最新的科技展览总是让我眼前一亮。

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 疫情洲后，博物馆都会采取新措施，重新对大家开放了吗？

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 恩，确实希望处于安全的考量，大家可以自由参观。
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的博物馆/dialog_00006_002/006.wav

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 早上吃早餐真的是一天中最期待的时刻！我通常会吃燕麦片，既健康又美味。

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 燕麦片吗？听上去不错，但我还是更喜欢传统的煎蛋吐司。

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 煎蛋吐司也不错！再加点果酱的话就完美了。我就爱这样不一样的早餐风味！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 对，有时候款式多些，人也会觉得气色更好啊。

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 有时候我还会给自己搞个果汁，怎么能少了营养嘛！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and disgusted emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 不知道，但我可不是那么喜欢那些麻烦的果汁.

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我一直很喜欢早上吃燕麦粥，加上牛奶和水果，营养又美味！

dialog_00004_002.content: 我最近听到很多人讨论奢侈品，不同的人都有不同的看法。

dialog_00004_002.content: 是啊，这种品牌有时候被视作炫耀，然而也有人认为是真正的工艺品。

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 其实我觉得奢侈品的魅力在于独特性和设计，有些真的很惊艳！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and disgusted emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 可是我们也不能忽视那种华而不实的东西，它们是否值得那么高的价格？

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 有个懂行的人说过，这其实在于你需要用质感去感受它们的价值！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 我承认，迫不及待想听听了！

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: 对我来说，奢侈品是一种品味的体现。它们往往是工艺和设计的结合，这可不是随便的产品。

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00005_000.content: 我明白这一点，但我还是会觉得这样花那么多钱似乎有点不实用。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我最近去买了一些新衣服，感觉特别不错！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 真的？你一定找到了一些漂亮的衣服吧！哪个商店的？

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 对啊，我在那个新开的购物中心，那里有好多选择！我还试了件裙子，超级漂亮！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 听起来非常好！我也想去看看，最近需要更新我的衣柜。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我还看到了一双帅气的鞋子，准备去买下来！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 哇，鞋子也很重要，给你搭配起来一定美翻！

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 在商场里我找到了一件特别漂亮的裙子，感觉自己像个公主！
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 交流最近的购物体验/dialog_00003_001/001.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 哇，真的吗？那是在哪家店买的？我推荐给我姐姐，她总是想找新衣服！
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 交流最近的购物体验/dialog_00003_001/002.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 在Zara，颜色特别鲜艳，我口袋的保险也称赞我，感觉买得贼值！
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 交流最近的购物体验/dialog_00003_001/003.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 说得有道理，有时候买对装备真是太成就感了！
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 交流最近的购物体验/dialog_00003_001/004.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 而且我还在那儿找到了折扣好多的鞋子，感觉贼划算！
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 交流最近的购物体验/dialog_00003_001/005.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 交流最近的购物体验/dialog_00003_001/006.wav

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: 我最近特别爱阅读，每天都会抽出时间来享受书本。

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_002.content: 我最近在读一本很有趣的小说！题材是悬疑类的，情节曲折得让我每晚都想多读一章！

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_002.content: 是啊，我推荐《凶手总是在左》，那真的是无法预警的反转！很烧脑、但也很有趣！

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 你知道吗，我对夜市文化特别感兴趣！在那些小摊贩一样吃好玩的，真的感觉像在探索世界！

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 最近听说有很多新科技在开发绿色能源，我真的对此感到超级兴奋！
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00005_002/001.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 是啊，科学家们的研究让我们在向可再生能源的方向前进，未来电力的来源有可能变得更加环保。
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00005_002/002.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 没错，而且许多公司也开始投资这些清洁能源项目，我觉得未来会很不一样！

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 没想到变化会来得这么快，那你预想的一些想法是什么？
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00005_002/004.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 像风能和太阳能，我觉得它们会彻底改变我们生活的样子！
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00005_002/005.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 嗯，是啊，希望可再生能源能越来越普及。
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00005_002/006.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 最近大家对未来能源的关注好多了，尤其是可再生能源。
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00003_001/001.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 对啊！我最近刚读到一些关于太阳能的新技术，真的让人很兴奋！
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00003_001/002.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 是啊，我也看过那些资料，与以前的技术比，效率真的提高不少。
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00003_001/003.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 这意味着我们未来可能会用更少的资源，就实现更多的能源。
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00003_001/004.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 而且这些能源在环保方面也有很大帮助，扭转气候变化嘛。
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00003_001/005.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 是的！未来的世界会因为这些改变变得更加美好！
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 分享对未来能源的期待/dialog_00003_001/006.wav

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 工作上最近遇到的挑战越来越多，真不知道该从哪里开始解决。

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 是啊，我也有这种感觉。还记得上次我们的项目进度那么慢吗？

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and sad emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 对，完全没办法按时交付，压力真是太大了。

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 但我们助手帮忙，还有一些创新的方法可以尝试，不是吗？

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 我觉得沟通不够顺畅，这是个大问题。

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 我同意，但是可以通过多开会来改善这个状况！

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 最近特别忙，总是有很多项目需要同时进行，觉得压力挺大的。

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 哦，那听起来有点累！你有尝试着跟团队沟通吗？也许他们可以提供一些帮助。
dialog_00008_002.wav_path: 探讨工作中的挑战/dialog_00008_002/002.wav

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and sad emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 是啊，但总感觉无法传达彻底，我不想让大家觉得我在抱怨。

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 我明白你的感觉，有时候我们也得为自己迫切的需要发声。

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 你觉得智能眼镜真的能够改变我们的生活方式吗？我相信有潜力！

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: 我一直梦想着能住一个有大花园的房子，想象着周末能够在花园里享受阳光！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 我最近开始上网络课程，真是太方便了！你不觉得吗？

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 真的？我对网络课程有点担忧，是不是真的那么好呢？

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 嗯，我觉得很好！能够在家里舒适地学习，很爱这种灵活性。

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 可是我听说很多人从网络课程中受益很大呀！
dialog_00003_000.wav_path: 讨论对网络课程的看法/dialog_00003_000/005.wav

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 是啊，很多人都适应得很好！无法反驳这点。

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 最近很多学校都在推网络课程，你觉得怎么样？

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 我觉得适应了之后，其实利弊都有，速度蛮快的。

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 最近我开始去健身房训练了，每周至少去三次哦！
dialog_00008_002.wav_path: 讨论平时的运动习惯/dialog_00008_002/001.wav

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 真的啊？真让我吃惊，我记得你之前不是说不太喜欢运动吗？
dialog_00008_002.wav_path: 讨论平时的运动习惯/dialog_00008_002/002.wav

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 是哦，不过我觉得坚持了一段时间后，身体变得很有活力！
dialog_00008_002.wav_path: 讨论平时的运动习惯/dialog_00008_002/003.wav

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 听起来不错，你有什么特别喜欢的运动吗？
dialog_00008_002.wav_path: 讨论平时的运动习惯/dialog_00008_002/004.wav

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 我特别喜欢跳有氧课，还好有迷人的教练！
dialog_00008_002.wav_path: 讨论平时的运动习惯/dialog_00008_002/005.wav

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 哈哈，如果是迷人教练我觉得我能坚持！
dialog_00008_002.wav_path: 讨论平时的运动习惯/dialog_00008_002/006.wav

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 你知道吗，我最近开始上健身房，感觉整个人都焕然一新！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 真的吗？你一直都不怎么运动，怎么突然改变了呢？

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 我觉得这样可以让我更有活力，练了几周已经明显感觉到体力提高了！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 听起来不错！你锻炼都做些什么项目呢？

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 我主要在跑步机上跑步，还加了点力量训练。

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 太赞了！我也想去健身，跟你一起锻炼怎样？！

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我最近开始学习西班牙语了，真的很有趣！
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨学习外语的经验/dialog_00010_001/001.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 西班牙语？太好了！你是因为什么原因开始学的呢？
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨学习外语的经验/dialog_00010_001/002.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我希望能在旅行的时候和当地人交流，听说这样会更好玩！
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨学习外语的经验/dialog_00010_001/003.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 绝对会！能跟当地人聊聊天很酷，你现在哪种学习方法呀？
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨学习外语的经验/dialog_00010_001/004.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我主要是通过应用程序，每天都练一下。感觉还是挺有效的！
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨学习外语的经验/dialog_00010_001/005.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 噢，那太好了，我喜欢这种方式，因为时间灵活！
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨学习外语的经验/dialog_00010_001/006.wav

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 我最近在学西班牙语，真的感觉进步很大，认识了很多新单词！

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 哇，太厉害了！你觉得最难的部分是什么？

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 我觉得是那些动词变位，特别是一开始的时候让我有点混乱。

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 是啊，那个确实挺复杂的，不过一旦掌握了就好很多。

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 不过我试着多跟母语者对话，这让我觉得轻松多了。

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 真的吗？那听起来很有效，目 - 目标也是很重要的！

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 我特别喜欢妈妈做的番茄炒蛋，简直是我的拿手好菜！
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨自己喜欢的家常菜/dialog_00005_002/001.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 糖醋排骨确实不错啊，酥脆的外皮配上酸甜的味道，真的很绝！
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨自己喜欢的家常菜/dialog_00005_002/003.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 哈哈，我一直想学，但总是搞得太甜或者太酸！
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨自己喜欢的家常菜/dialog_00005_002/004.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 要不咱们下周约个时间一起做饭？可以试着做些新菜和老菜！
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨自己喜欢的家常菜/dialog_00005_002/005.wav

dialog_00005_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00005_002.content: 这堂课听起来真的很有趣，我等不及了！
dialog_00005_002.wav_path: 探讨自己喜欢的家常菜/dialog_00005_002/006.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 我最近才学会了做红烧肉，味道真不错！
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 探讨自己喜欢的家常菜/dialog_00001_000/001.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: 聊聊你对未来工作的看法吧，我会毕业了，得开始考虑下一个阶段了。

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: 谷子，我只想找到一个让我充满激情的工作，我对未���充满期待！

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: 这是个好主意。你觉得你的专业能给你带来更多的机会吗？
dialog_00006_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来工作的展望/dialog_00006_000/003.wav

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: 肯定，我的专业真的广泛，而且教我一个人际关系管理这方面的知识!
dialog_00006_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来工作的展望/dialog_00006_000/004.wav

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: 听起来真的不错啊，未来期许成真的机会真的很多抽呢！

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: 是啊，就是GOOD！我已经列好了适合的公司，真报得如愿办信，享受挑战！
dialog_00006_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来工作的展望/dialog_00006_000/006.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 最近我一直在思考未来工作的方向，感觉有些迷茫。
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来工作的展望/dialog_00009_000/001.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 当然，我也是！这行业实在在变化太快了，有什么目标了吗？
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来工作的展望/dialog_00009_000/002.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and angry emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 目标是有的，但不知道怎么实现，真让人沮丧。这完全不像我想象的那样顺利。
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来工作的展望/dialog_00009_000/003.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 嗯，我理解你的感受。有时候我们需要调整自己的计划，然后重新规划一下策略。
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来工作的展望/dialog_00009_000/004.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 我在考虑自己是不是该换个方向，可能哪个好这样能适应一些变化？
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来工作的展望/dialog_00009_000/005.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_000.content: 我最近学会了做红烧肉，味道真的超级棒！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 我其实只是简单地参考了一些网络教程，配方也不是很复杂，就是味增和酱油的比例要掌握好！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 真的吗？这样就能做出这么好吃的红烧肉，你真厉害！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 有一个简单的配菜就是拍黄瓜，你想知道怎么做吗？

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 当然想知道，拍黄瓜一直是我的最爱！

dialog_00001_002.content: 你知道吗，我自己常做的菜是白菜炖豆腐！特别简单，味道却超级好！

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: 嗯，我会先炒香葱姜蒜然后再放白菜，豆腐，更香了！还加一点盐。

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 哇，听起来不错！定制的东西总是让人觉得特别有吸引力。

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_002.content: 对啊，我觉得那样真的可以反映自己的个性，这才是最重要的！

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00008_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_000.content: 我听说未来的医療技术可能会使用基因编辑来消除疾病，这听起来太令人兴奋了！

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 我最近真的很喜欢烤箱料理，有种神奇的感觉！

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 哦？怎么说？烤箱料理给你带来了什么不一样的体验呢？

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 我觉得它让食物的味道浓郁又保持了很多水分，烤出来的鸡腿简直让人垂涎！

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 听起来不错，我还没尝试过用烤箱做这么多东西呢！

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 如果你愿意，我们可以一起试着做……有很多食谱真的很好玩！

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 真的吗！那我肯定想参加！期待能一起带出好东西。

dialog_00005_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我最近看了一部电影，真的太精彩了，书卷般的画面感！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 是《王者归来》，虽然我之前没太有听说过，但被朋友推荐的还是值得一看。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我听说过，这真的很棒，挑战自我，战斗技巧都特别好。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 是啊，特别是那些打斗场景，真的是视觉盛宴！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_002.content: 我强烈推荐你去影院看，感觉才能体会到那种氛围！

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 我最近对人工智能的发展感到有些困惑，可能未来会有很多意想不到的变化。
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨对人工智能的看法/dialog_00008_001/001.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 嗯，我也这样想，看起来机器学习和AI技术越来越普遍了，它们到底会怎么影响我们呢？
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨对人工智能的看法/dialog_00008_001/002.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 其实我觉得，人工智能不仅会改变行业，更可能改变人们的生活方式。
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨对人工智能的看法/dialog_00008_001/003.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 确实，同时也会产生一些隐私和安全方面的问题，让我感到有点担忧。
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨对人工智能的看法/dialog_00008_001/004.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 我们是否应该对这些技术保持更加审慎的态度呢？
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨对人工智能的看法/dialog_00008_001/005.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 嗯，同意啊，今年来AI发展的瞬息万变，真需要小心使用。
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 探讨对人工智能的看法/dialog_00008_001/006.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and disgusted emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: 你们觉得快速时尚真的是个问题么？我真的觉得这种消费模式太糟糕了。

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and angry emotion.

dialog_00006_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and angry emotion.
dialog_00006_000.content: 我 think the focus应该在支持可持续的品牌上，而不是这些快速变换的潮流。

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 你知道现在健身成为了大多人的生活方式吗，大家都变得越来越重视健康！

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 最近我考虑开始健身，听说健身对身体不错。

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 对啊，健身能让你感觉更有活力，也能改善心情！

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 可是有时候我觉得坚持不到那么有趣，我总是想放弃。

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 我了解那种感觉，不过你能查一些适合你的锻炼项目，也可以找到志同道合的人一起锻炼！

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 你说得对，和别人一起锻炼可能会更有动力！

dialog_00010_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_000.content: 绝对没错！义务感会逼着你更努力哦！

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 最近我在想，未来的家庭结构可能会发生很多变化，比如一些人可能选择不结婚。你怎么看？
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00008_000/001.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 真的吗？我从没想过这个问题，但确实不婚主义在越来越普遍了。
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00008_000/002.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 是啊，有的人会想过得更自由，不想被传统结构束缚住。
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00008_000/003.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 没错，家庭更可能是一种选择，不再是固定的形式。
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00008_000/004.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 而且这种变化可能会导致社会对家庭的定义发生重新审视。
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00008_000/005.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 这样看来，未来的家庭肯定会更加多元，太好了！
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00008_000/006.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 听说未来的家庭结构会变得更灵活，越来越多的人选择不婚而组成伙伴关系。
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00001_000/001.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 真的？我一直以为婚姻是最稳定的安排，怎么会有人那么随意选择呢？
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00001_000/002.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 我觉得这是为了充分体现个体的自由，很多人想让感情更加灵活，而不是被婚姻约束。
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00001_000/003.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 这种想法确实有道理，不过在我看来，家庭的稳定还是很重要的。
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流对未来家庭结构的看法/dialog_00001_000/004.wav

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: 你知道现在的科技发展得有多快吗？虚拟现实和人工智能都让人觉得无比兴奋！
dialog_00005_001.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00005_001/001.wav

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: 我完全同意！尤其是人工智能，它能改变很多行业，甚至我们的日常生活。
dialog_00005_001.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00005_001/002.wav

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: 对啊，很多工作都在被自动化，但这也令人不安，咱们该如何适应这变化呢？
dialog_00005_001.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00005_001/003.wav

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: 是的，关键是我们要不断学习，掌握新技能，这样才不会落后时代。
dialog_00005_001.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00005_001/004.wav

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: 说得没错，现在抓住这些机遇真的很重要啊！
dialog_00005_001.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00005_001/005.wav

dialog_00005_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and sad emotion.
dialog_00005_001.content: 不过，有些人可能真的跟不上，这是个值得担心的问题。
dialog_00005_001.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00005_001/006.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 我最近开始真的对人工智能和区块链技术感兴趣，尤其是它们如何改变 бизнес模型！
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00007_002/001.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 哇，听起来非常酷！我也对科技创新有一点兴趣，你最喜欢哪个项目？
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00007_002/002.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 我觉得人工智能特带感，因为它能在很多领域解决很多问题，比如健康医疗和教育！
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00007_002/003.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 说的有道理。其实我也看到不少公司在人工智能上投入，希望落地的技术能够改变普通人的生活。
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00007_002/004.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 没错，我认为这种进步背后的潜力是惊人的！
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00007_002/005.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 有点令人担忧，毕竟技术包括风险和竞争挑战。
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 探讨对科技创新的感兴趣程度/dialog_00007_002/006.wav

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 我真是个运动狂！最近入手了不少Nike的新款，涂装都超酷的！

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 哇，是真的吧！我听说今年的款式特别受欢迎，那你觉得怎么样？

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 绝对令人满意！鞋子轻便又舒适，跑起来透气非常好！

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 听到你这么说，我也想考虑一下！可是我比较偏爱Adidas，我觉得他们的款式更经典。没有什么实际体验呢！

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 可是Nike的运动气息总是让我兴奋不已，哪都有他们的设备！

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 是啊，这是梦想状态！真希望能有更多的场合去分享这些。

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 你知道吗，我最近买了一双耐克的运动鞋，穿起来真的超舒服！
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的运动品牌/dialog_00004_001/001.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 哇，真的没想到你会选耐克！你好像一直都在说你是亚瑟士的粉丝呢！
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的运动品牌/dialog_00004_001/002.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 是啊，我以前就是很迷亚瑟士，但这双耐克的鞋潮流感也很强哦！
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的运动品牌/dialog_00004_001/003.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 哈哈，看来你是两家品牌的国际间谍！那这双值得推荐么？
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的运动品牌/dialog_00004_001/004.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 绝对值得，我觉得这几个牌子都有自己的特色。
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的运动品牌/dialog_00004_001/005.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 是啊，各有什么长处。不过你更喜欢哪一个？
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的运动品牌/dialog_00004_001/006.wav

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我最近开始练习行书，觉得它很优美而且自然，比起篆书来更易于上手。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 是吗？我也挺喜欢行书的，感觉流畅极了，你喜欢哪位书法家的风格呢？

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我最喜欢王羲之！他的字每一个都有传神之感，真的是艺术啊！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 王羲之！那的确是非常牛的人，我听说他的《兰亭集序》写得简直美呆了！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我们可以一起去书法展，很期待看到更多书法作品！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 好的，我也是，看到那样的作品一定会让人感到无比激动！

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_000.content: 我最近一直在练习草书，真的觉得这种风格很自由。每次挥毫都让我感觉心情愉快！
dialog_00004_000.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的书法风格/dialog_00004_000/001.wav

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00004_000.content: 草书吗？我一直觉得那种感觉很难掌握，你是怎么找到这种灵感的？
dialog_00004_000.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的书法风格/dialog_00004_000/002.wav

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_000.content: 其实是因为一句话让我觉得草书代表了书法的另一种激情，与众不同，所以我就大胆尝试了！
dialog_00004_000.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的书法风格/dialog_00004_000/003.wav

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_000.content: 有趣，我以前总是更喜欢行书，觉得它既规整又有个性。
dialog_00004_000.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的书法风格/dialog_00004_000/004.wav

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_000.content: 是啊，我们可以查一下行书和草书的风格，说不定可以从中得到启发！
dialog_00004_000.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的书法风格/dialog_00004_000/005.wav

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_000.content: 好主意！这两个风格都很有意思，看看两者如何碰撞出火花！
dialog_00004_000.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的书法风格/dialog_00004_000/006.wav

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我最近尝试早起，感觉精神不错。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 真的吗？早起是怎样一种体验？我从来都很难早起啊。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 一开始真的有点困难，但是我发现早晨很安静，这让我思考得更清楚。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 听起来很好，我应该给自己些动力去早起了。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 对啊，我们可以一起早起，那样更有动力！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 好主意！那么我们决定从下周开始扭转作息如何？

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 你知道吗，我最近开始早起，感觉一天开始得更好！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 真的？我从来没想过自己会早起，可是听你这么说，听起来不错！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 是啊！我现在有时间做早餐，还能锻炼，真的能提升心情！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 听起来蛮不错的，我也想试试，但早上起那么早……

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 我劝你可以慢慢调整，肯定会享受早起带来的好处！

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 好主意，那我要提前设个闹钟试试！

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 哇，你的狗狗真可爱！它是什么品种的啊？
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流养宠物的经验/dialog_00001_000/001.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 谢谢！它是拉布拉多，性格特别温顺，总喜欢和我一起出去玩。
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流养宠物的经验/dialog_00001_000/002.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 拉布拉多！我听说他们很聪明，我一直想养一只！
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流养宠物的经验/dialog_00001_000/003.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 是啊。他们确实很聪明，训练起来也相对容易。
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流养宠物的经验/dialog_00001_000/004.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 那你有没有哪些心得可以分享呀？
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流养宠物的经验/dialog_00001_000/005.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 总的来说，我觉得耐心和爱心是最重要的！
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 交流养宠物的经验/dialog_00001_000/006.wav

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 我最近养了一只小狗，真的是我生活中最好的决定！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 哇，听起来不错！是什么品种的？

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 她是只金毛，非常活泼！每天都能带给我好多快乐。

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 太棒了！我一直在考虑也养宠物，但是不知道选什么品种好。

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 真的推荐你去养一只，你一定会爱上它的！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 理论上是这样，但我告诉你，我也需要多考虑考虑护理问题。

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 马上就是国庆了，我正在计划去海边度假，真是迫不及待！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 海边？听起来不错！你有哪些具体的安排吗？

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 我想租个海景房，还想给自己放个假日俩小时海上冲浪呢！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 这线路真理想！我上大学的时候也去过海边，但没有冲浪过。

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 你要不要一起去？这样更热闹！

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 只是冲浪有点怕，感觉那岂不是很危险？

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 今年的国庆节我打算去海边露营，天气预报显示那几天会很不错！
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 交流最近的节日计划/dialog_00006_001/001.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 啊，真的？海边露营听起来太棒了！你现金准备了什么？
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 交流最近的节日计划/dialog_00006_001/002.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 我准备了一些食材，还带上了我们喜欢的烧烤工具！这次还想租个小船出去玩！
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 交流最近的节日计划/dialog_00006_001/003.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 哇，那肯定很欢乐。真希望我有时间能跟你们一起去。
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 交流最近的节日计划/dialog_00006_001/004.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 诚心邀请你，一起去吧！
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 交流最近的节日计划/dialog_00006_001/005.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 我最近有很多工作，去与否还不确定。
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 交流最近的节日计划/dialog_00006_001/006.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 今天我去超市看见那种泡面有特价，马上就想到了你，觉得你可能会需要！
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 讨论平时的购物清单/dialog_00008_000/001.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 哦，真的啊！我也正想要去买呢，看看还能不能找到打折的米。
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 讨论平时的购物清单/dialog_00008_000/002.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 是啊，现在挺多良心超市都有优惠，我们可以多备一些食材！
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 讨论平时的购物清单/dialog_00008_000/003.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 不过，有时候这些特价的东西质量不稳定，你买还是要小心点。
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 讨论平时的购物清单/dialog_00008_000/004.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 我同意，不过只要选择那些可靠的品牌，一般还是不容易出问题的！
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 讨论平时的购物清单/dialog_00008_000/005.wav

dialog_00008_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_000.content: 你说得对！现在能省一点就是赚一点，很感谢你的推荐！
dialog_00008_000.wav_path: 讨论平时的购物清单/dialog_00008_000/006.wav

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 最近我发现购物真的很有趣，我开始尝试做各种食谱！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 哇，你真的开始做饭了吗？那你准备好一些锅碗瓢盆了吗？

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 哈哈，是啊，第一次买的一堆餐具！而且周末我还去市场买了新鲜的食材。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 听起来不错，市场上的新鲜食材一定选择丰富。你打算做什么好吃的呢？

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我，想试试做披萨，之前看的食谱好像还不错！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_000.content: 她是灰色的，身上还有白色的小点，像星星一样！

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_000.content: 会的！她特别好奇，每次看到新玩具都会立刻扑过去。

dialog_00004_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我真的很喜欢猫哟，它们那么可爱，有个性！你有想过养猫吗？

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 其实我一直挺想的，看到朋友的猫都觉得乖巧又好玩。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 是啊，它们还特别喜欢找人陪！说不定跟你特别合得来！

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我搞不清楚，一只猫和一只狗，两者？

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 我觉得养狗的话，陪伴性会更强淹，上公园都有人一起。

dialog_00002_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_000.content: 是啊，狗狗特别会让你感觉幸福，我有朋友就是养狗呢！

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 你觉得社交礼仪真的那么重要吗？

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 当然啊，这可是让人际关系更和谐的好方法！
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 讨论对社交礼仪的看法/dialog_00001_001/002.wav

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 但有时候我觉得太过于拘谨反而让人难放松。
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 讨论对社交礼仪的看法/dialog_00001_001/003.wav

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 说得对，适当的放松也是必须的，礼仪不应成为压力。

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 那你认为在第一次见面时，哪个社交礼仪最关键词？

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 以微笑开场最能让双方放松吧，毕竟这是个初次。
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 讨论对社交礼仪的看法/dialog_00001_001/006.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 我觉得社交礼仪真的很重要，它可以帮助我们更好地与人沟通。
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 讨论对社交礼仪的看法/dialog_00008_001/001.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 对啊，像在正式场合打招呼的时候，一句合适的话能让人感觉受欢迎。
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 讨论对社交礼仪的看法/dialog_00008_001/002.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 没错，诸如肢体语言或者是微笑之类的小细节也很关键！
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 讨论对社交礼仪的看法/dialog_00008_001/003.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 不过在一些非正式的场合里，我们随意一点也没关系吧？
dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 讨论对社交礼仪的看法/dialog_00008_001/004.wav

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00008_001.content: 我觉得至少基本的礼仪还是得遵守的，对吧？

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00008_001.wav_path: 讨论对社交礼仪的看法/dialog_00008_001/006.wav

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 我真的很期待周末，计划去爬山！你觉得怎么样？

dialog_00007_000.content: 爬山？听起来不错，你知道哪座山吗？

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 哦，原来如此，我也挺想去的。

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 而且天气预报说周末放晴，我想去玩水！

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_000.content: 玩水肯定很棒！我真的想加入！

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 要准备帐篷，食物、饮料，还有烧烤设备，肯定好玩！

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and sad emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 散步吗？其实我手机没电，寿命大概只剩几个小时了，搞得溜达都没动力。
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 讨论日常生活中的小烦恼/dialog_00009_000/003.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 我有充电宝，帮你充吧，否者你真是难经济啊，连散步都顾不上。
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 讨论日常生活中的小烦恼/dialog_00009_000/004.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and sad emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 谢谢你，可我觉得不光是充电的问题，好些小烦恼都让我摸不着头脑。
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 讨论日常生活中的小烦恼/dialog_00009_000/005.wav

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00009_000.content: 呐，对，想弹出烦恼也得偷偷倾诉一番呀，有空一起聊聊吧。
dialog_00009_000.wav_path: 讨论日常生活中的小烦恼/dialog_00009_000/006.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 最近我每天都在忙工作，午餐经常都会忍将就了。你午餐通常怎么安排呢？

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 哇，那听起来挺健康的！你通常自己做吗？

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00008_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00009_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_002.content: 不过我还是担心，买的东西太多会不会到头来有很多闲置呢？

dialog_00009_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 角色与自然的融合真的很迷人！我特别喜欢那些带有晨雾的山景。

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 我真的很喜欢城市生活！每天都能遇到新鲜事，简直就像一场精彩的冒险！
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00010_002/001.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 我也是！那种人来人往的氛围让我感觉充满活力。你觉得最吸引你的是什么呢？
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00010_002/002.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 我觉得是一切，那些不同的文化、各式各样的美食，生活真是五彩缤纷的！
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00010_002/003.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 确实如此，城市不会让我感到无聊。你有没有去过什么特别的地方呢？
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00010_002/004.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 最近我去了一家新开的咖啡馆，那里的氛围让我眼前一亮！
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00010_002/005.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 真的？我也想去尝试一下，顺便一起聊聊天！
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00010_002/006.wav

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: 我真羡慕住在城市里的人，繁华热闹的感觉太棒了！
dialog_00002_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00002_002/001.wav

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: 是啊，城市里总是有那么多事情可以做。但我觉得有时候太吵了。
dialog_00002_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00002_002/002.wav

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: 嗯，我倒觉得各种活动让我觉得充实，特别夏天市场上的美食现场，我最爱！
dialog_00002_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00002_002/003.wav

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: 对，美食真的是大城市的一个吸引点。不过，生活成本也挺高的。
dialog_00002_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00002_002/004.wav

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: 但是热闹的时候就真的值了，随时能找到乐子！
dialog_00002_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00002_002/005.wav

dialog_00002_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00002_002.content: 同意，但我真希望能够寻找更多鱼更风格的生活，还有风景的组成！
dialog_00002_002.wav_path: 讨论对城市生活的喜爱/dialog_00002_002/006.wav

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 当然！我自己用过，天天晚上都能在家轻松跑步，不成问题！
dialog_00009_001.wav_path: 讨论对跑步机的看法/dialog_00009_001/004.wav

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 听起来很不错，Est特别是冬天待在家里，我是不是需要考虑真的购买了。
dialog_00009_001.wav_path: 讨论对跑步机的看法/dialog_00009_001/005.wav

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 对，最烦就是寒冷的天气，不用出门就能锻炼了！
dialog_00009_001.wav_path: 讨论对跑步机的看法/dialog_00009_001/006.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我真的很喜欢使用跑步机，它很方便，只要在家都能锻炼！

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 对啊，但是我一直觉得在户外跑步更有趣，你不觉得吗？

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 确实，户外的风景很不错，但天气太冷的时候我就喜欢待在一个温暖的地方跑！

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我理解，只是对跑步机的感觉有点不一样，像是在练习节奏。

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 我一直在看看数字货币的情况，听说它可能会改变金融的未来。
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00003_001/001.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 是啊，这些年它的确成长得很快，尤其是比特币！你考虑投资吗？
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00003_001/002.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 可能会吧，特别是看着它们的涨幅，真的挺诱人的！
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00003_001/003.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 不过，波动也很大，这种投资风险可得考虑清楚。
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00003_001/004.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 我知道，但我还是想了解它的基本原理。
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00003_001/005.wav

dialog_00003_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_001.content: 当然！这让我想起了最近看到的一些非常有趣的资料。
dialog_00003_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00003_001/006.wav

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 你觉得数字货币有什么特别的地方吗？
dialog_00007_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00007_001/001.wav

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 当然，有很多人看好数字货币的未来，感觉它会改变金融体系！
dialog_00007_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00007_001/002.wav

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 可是我觉得数字货币的波动性太大了，这让我很担心。
dialog_00007_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00007_001/003.wav

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 我明白你的担忧，但风险投资本身就意味着要接受一定的不确定性。
dialog_00007_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00007_001/004.wav

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and angry emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 是啊，不过有时我觉得它更像是个炒作的泡沫，而不是一种可靠的资产。
dialog_00007_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00007_001/005.wav

dialog_00007_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and disgusted emotion.
dialog_00007_001.content: 这种情绪确实很普遍，为什么恶心于这种新事物呢？
dialog_00007_001.wav_path: 讨论对数字货币的理解/dialog_00007_001/006.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我最近在家里重新布置！我发现自己喜欢简约风格，超干净利落的感觉很棒。
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的家居设计风格/dialog_00010_001/001.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 哦，真的吗？这和你之前喜欢的那种诡异小装饰品有点不一样。

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 哈，没错，那时候我觉得更加夸张能提神，现在越渐长大，觉得简约最醒目。

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我也是！有时候太多的装饰让我觉得异样，简单合理的设计反而令生活变得自在。

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我们其实可以一起讨论优化如何，我觉得组合色会尤为重要！

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00002_001.content: 我最近真的是沉迷于现代极简风格，虽说简单，但感觉一切都太美了！

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00002_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
