dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 最近天气变化真大，前几天还很热，今天却突然降温了。
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00006_001/001.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 我也是，早上出门时觉得阳光还不错，怎么不到中午就变凉了。
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00006_001/002.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 是啊！我其实挺喜欢这种变化的，衣橱里的秋装终于可以派上用场了！
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00006_001/003.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 假如天气一直如此多变，我的衣服也得准备不少了，你知道我的风格总是在跟着季节变化！
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00006_001/004.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and sad emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 这就是坏处，这样我总是不知道该穿什么出门。
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00006_001/005.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and angry emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 哎，真的会烦呢，总是要换衣服，还不如一个季节喜欢穿相同的。
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00006_001/006.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 最近的天气真是奇怪，正午的时候热得要命，但到了晚上又冷得很。
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00010_001/001.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 是啊！早上要出门的时候得下载个天气应用来检查。感觉随时都是天气预报！
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00010_001/002.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我个人觉得玩的版本很好，变化带来了更多乐趣！
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00010_001/003.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 嗯，确实，这种变化挺让人期待的，只是有时候真的会让人感觉没办法适应。
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00010_001/004.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and sad emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 不过，天气变化也可能带来马蜂和蟑螂这些不容易接的家伙。
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00010_001/005.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and angry emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 哎，这不仅仅是麻烦，真的令人感到头疼！
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 探讨对天气变化的感受/dialog_00010_001/006.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 真的嘛？要换成什么呢？难道是追求你的另一个兴趣吗？

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 嗯，我有些在考虑数据分析，听说这个领域很有前景。

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 真的假的？那你之前一直喜欢编程呀，怎么会转行呢？
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 交流对自己职业的看法/dialog_00001_001/004.wav

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 是啊，我想找到适合我的事情。
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 交流对自己职业的看法/dialog_00001_001/005.wav

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 哇，听起来确实很有趣！你打算怎么开始呢？
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 交流对自己职业的看法/dialog_00001_001/006.wav

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 我最近在我的职业生涯中找到了新的乐趣，真的感觉很不错！
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 交流对自己职业的看法/dialog_00006_002/001.wav

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 哦？是什么让你感觉得特别开心？何况你一直工作那么忙嘛。
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 交流对自己职业的看法/dialog_00006_002/002.wav

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 我刚接手了一个新项目，非常有挑战性！而且团队氛围也很好，大家都支持我！
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 交流对自己职业的看法/dialog_00006_002/003.wav

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 听起来是一份不错的工作！你每天的工作内容在变化吗？
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 交流对自己职业的看法/dialog_00006_002/004.wav

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 是的，更有活力了，每天都有兴奋的事情等着我！
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 交流对自己职业的看法/dialog_00006_002/005.wav

dialog_00006_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and angry emotion.
dialog_00006_002.content: 噢，一个职业的选逃是错的，记得要报告上司任何需要的支持!
dialog_00006_002.wav_path: 交流对自己职业的看法/dialog_00006_002/006.wav

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 你不知道，上周末的家庭聚会真是太开心了！我们爷爷格外高兴，几乎没停过嘴！
dialog_00004_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00004_002/001.wav

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 哦，听起来不错！你们大家都在一起吗？
dialog_00004_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00004_002/002.wav

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 对啊！还烤了鸡翅，做好多美食。我一直在感叹，真的觉得跟家人在一起是最幸福的事！
dialog_00004_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00004_002/003.wav

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and sad emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 听起来好棒，我已经很久没全家人聚在一起了...
dialog_00004_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00004_002/004.wav

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 下次你也该来加入，大家在一起真的很热闹！
dialog_00004_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00004_002/005.wav

dialog_00004_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_002.content: 想听听更多，我们每次都很开心地聊天呢，是吗？
dialog_00004_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00004_002/006.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 上个周末的亲戚聚会真是太棒了，大家都很高兴！
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00007_002/001.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 哦，真是让我羡慕！所有人都来了吗？
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00007_002/002.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 当然了，连我们几个没见好久的表兄弟姐妹都回来了，一起聊了很多！
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00007_002/003.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 听起来真不错，家人在一起总是特别温暖。
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00007_002/004.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 对啊，我一直觉得这样的聚会让愿望变得更加美好！
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00007_002/005.wav

dialog_00007_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and angry emotion.
dialog_00007_002.content: 可可是安排这么多人也真麻烦！
dialog_00007_002.wav_path: 分享对家庭聚会的感受/dialog_00007_002/006.wav

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: 哇，最近看到了很多关于环保产品的讨论，感觉大家越来越关注这些东西了！
dialog_00001_002.wav_path: 探讨对环保产品的认知/dialog_00001_002/001.wav

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: 是啊，确实有不少新品牌冒出来了，而且听说这些产品的质量也提升了很多。
dialog_00001_002.wav_path: 探讨对环保产品的认知/dialog_00001_002/002.wav

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: 对，我昨天还买了一些环保洗衣粉，使用起来效果非常不错！
dialog_00001_002.wav_path: 探讨对环保产品的认知/dialog_00001_002/003.wav

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: 真的吗？我还没有试过这些产品，原本以为它们的效果可能会欠缺。
dialog_00001_002.wav_path: 探讨对环保产品的认知/dialog_00001_002/004.wav

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_002.content: 其实，很多产品都表示用的材料是天然的，对皮肤也好哦！

dialog_00001_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 最近我在看一些环保产品，觉得它们真是太棒了！
dialog_00003_000.wav_path: 探讨对环保产品的认知/dialog_00003_000/001.wav

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 是哦，我对环保产品还不是特别了解，都是些什么呢？

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 包括可降解的洗涤剂和以再生材料制作的商品，这些东西都超有意义的。

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 听起来不错，但它们真的能做出什么不同吗？
dialog_00003_000.wav_path: 探讨对环保产品的认知/dialog_00003_000/004.wav

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 哎，你知道，有一些品牌声称它们对环境影响很小，其实应该多去了解一下。
dialog_00003_000.wav_path: 探讨对环保产品的认知/dialog_00003_000/005.wav

dialog_00003_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_000.content: 那我准备明天就研究研究，看看能不能找到一些值得尝试的产品！
dialog_00003_000.wav_path: 探讨对环保产品的认知/dialog_00003_000/006.wav

dialog_00007_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 最近的天气真不错，阳光也很明媚，感觉整个人都心情大好！

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 是啊，前几天还臭烘烘的，忽然转变得这么好，你感觉空气也清新了不少吗？

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 确实，我每天早上出门都感觉空气好、新鲜又舒服！

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00009_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00009_001.content: 那倒是，只是天气这么好，人多了有点烦。

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 对呀！感觉这阳光能够给人带来很多正能量，出去走走肯定很舒服。

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00003_002.content: 我真的好喜欢那家小红咖啡馆，它的拿铁超好喝！

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 小红咖啡馆？我听过，但没去过。它有什么特别的吗？

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 除了咖啡好喝，那里的气氛也很棒，墙上挂着好多画。

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 听起来不错，描述得让我都想去看看了！

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00003_002.content: 你下次可以和我一起去，我可以推荐你最喜欢的迷你澳白！

dialog_00003_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 最近我觉得工作压力有点大，似乎总是需要赶很多项目。
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00001_001/001.wav

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 我明白，压力大可能会影响你的健康，你有没有试着抽出一些时间休息？
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00001_001/002.wav

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 其实我上个周末去了海边，真的非常放松！
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00001_001/003.wav

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 海边？听起来不错，洗去工作的烦恼了吗？
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00001_001/004.wav

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 我们怎么样才能更好地找到这个平衡呢？
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00001_001/005.wav

dialog_00001_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_001.content: 可能制定一些具体的工作与休息计划会更有效吧。
dialog_00001_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00001_001/006.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 最近工作上的事让我有点困扰，感觉休息的时间越来越少。
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00010_001/001.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 是吗？工作那么忙，怎么不给自己安排点休息时间呢？
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00010_001/002.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and sad emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 我知道，但总是有很多事情需要处理，感觉很难抽出时间来放松。
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00010_001/003.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 其实有时候只需要短暂的放松，就能让人恢复精力，你有没有试过呢？
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00010_001/004.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 昨天下班景哥还问我打算什么时候安排假期，我都不知道该怎么回答。
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00010_001/005.wav

dialog_00010_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_001.content: 有时候可以从小假期开始，像只周末的出游，就应该很多能加出感觉。
dialog_00010_001.wav_path: 讨论工作与休息的平衡/dialog_00010_001/006.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 最近我去了远足，真的是太值得了！山上的景色美得让人心旷神怡。
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00004_001/001.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 听起来很不错！你是和朋友们一起去的吗？
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00004_001/002.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 对啊，我们还拍了很多照片，天空湛蓝，看得简直绝了！
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00004_001/003.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 哇，真想亲自去看一次！我也很喜欢这种开阔的感觉。
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00004_001/004.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 可是你去的频率怎么感觉好像挺少的，是因为太忙了吗？
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00004_001/005.wav

dialog_00004_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00004_001.content: 嗯，其实时间安排上总是有点困难，没时间去。
dialog_00004_001.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00004_001/006.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 嘿，你知道吗？我昨天去爬山了，空气真好！
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00010_002/001.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 哇，真不错！你是自己去的吗？紧张不紧张？
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00010_002/002.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 不，我是和几个朋友一起去的，挺开心的！山顶的风景超美！
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00010_002/003.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 听起来像是一种很棒的体验！我一直想去爬山，但还没有尝试过呢。
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00010_002/004.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 如果你有空的话，可以一起去啊，我很想带你去通往那座山的沿途景色！
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00010_002/005.wav

dialog_00010_002.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00010_002.content: 哇，那太好玩了！我不想错过这次活动！
dialog_00010_002.wav_path: 讨论喜欢的野外活动/dialog_00010_002/006.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 我总是在想，未来的住房应该会跟现在大相径庭。
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00001_000/001.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 是啊，我也这么觉得！感觉未来的信息技术会对住房的设计产生重大影响。
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00001_000/002.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 对啊！像智能家居还有自适应设计这样的概念，真是让人兴奋！
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00001_000/003.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 但我认为，环保可能会是未来住房设计中非常重要的一环。
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00001_000/004.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 我们对未来的定义其实现实吗？我们建设住房需投有哪些think暑压力？
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00001_000/005.wav

dialog_00001_000.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00001_000.content: 是啊，这都得搞定才行，不然可不算靠谱！
dialog_00001_000.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00001_000/006.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 我在想未来的房子可能会有花园，这样可以种很多植物。
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00006_001/001.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and surprised emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 真的吗？我从没想过是这个方向，花园会很不错!
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00006_001/002.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and neutral emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 不仅如此，我也希望房子的材料更加环保，用的是可再生的材料。
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00006_001/003.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 这是个好主意，能够保护环境，又美观，一举两得！
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00006_001/004.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A female speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 而且空间里可以有人造的智能系统来帮助我们。
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00006_001/005.wav

dialog_00006_001.insturct_style: A male speaker with normal pitch, normal speaking rate, and happy emotion.
dialog_00006_001.content: 这样想起来未来真是太美好了，我已经迫不及待了！
dialog_00006_001.wav_path: 探讨对未来住房的想象/dialog_00006_001/006.wav
